Articles.Content:
Hi I'm Not New To This Forum But This Is A New Account (I Don't Remember If I Ever Had An Account)

I Think I've Been Playing KSP Since V0.14.0 Or One Around That Time

Well, welcome to the forum in any case FluxUmbreon115!

I hope you enjoy our fine community with your new account. Glad to have you aboard.

Happy landings!

Welcome aboard, FlexUmbron!

Playing since 0.14? That's a heck of a lot more time than me!
